entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
